inclusion.criterion: Patients without significant cardiorespiratory disease diagnosed, matched for age and body mass index to the group of COPD patients and APD in LTOT;
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: Acceptance to participate and agreement to sign the Informed Consent Term
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patients with COPD and APD in LTOT;
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patients who do not have associated severe heart disease;
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: Patients with no pulmonary exacerbations in the past four weeks;
inclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Patients with a disability or orthopedic disfunction that unable mobility or performance of physical tests;
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Patients using lipid-lowering drugs such as statins and fibrates;
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has multifactorial chronic hypoxemia and dyspnea thought due to diastolic CHF, pulmonary hypertension thought secondary to a chronic ASD and COPD on 5L home oxygen. Cardiology consult recommended a right heart cath for evaluation of response to sildenafil but the patient refused.
